resources.string: STEP 1 \n Use the plus button to add assessments to your calculation.
STEP 2 \nComplete the detials for each assessment you have added.
STEP 3 \nUse the equals button to calculate your final mark.
Weightings \nThe weighting attribute refers to how much an assessment counts towards your final mark. When all the assessment weightings are added together they must add up to a 100%
Marks \nThe mark attribute refers to the mark you scored for that assessment or you estimate there of.
Help \nIf you ever need help again use the question mark button.

About 
This app calculates your final mark given all assessment's weightings and marks
(either real or your estimate) 
This application was created 
by ToasTea Computing
Premium version available on these app markets

Save a Template\nCreate your template by adding assessments and their names and weightings. Next click the overflow menu button(3 little dots) in the top right corner. Next click Save Template and give it a name and click save. Now you have a template you can reuse.
Load a Template\nTo load a template click the overflow menu button(3 little dots) in the top right corner. Next click Load Template and select one of your templates you have saved.

Delete a Template\nClick on the overflow menu button(3 little dots) in the top right corner. Next click Delete Template and select a template you would like to delete. Be careful you won\'t be asked if you are sure you want to delete that template.
